确认要退出应用程序吗?
This player can be used \ nin order to securely purchase \ nthe content you have purchased and \ nthat is essential for learning.
With the first online certification, you can easily use content even in an environment without the Internet.
First, choose a repository from the menu.
How do I view a video (lecture)?
To play video (lecture), "serial authentication" is always required. \nRun app> Select "Internal storage" or "SD card" or "USB storage"> Select "Video (Lecture)"> Authenticate serial> Play

Serial authentication can be done with "serial photography" and "direct input". (Authentication is required only for first playback.) 

The serial authentication process is only available online (eg LTE, WIFI ...).. 
1. Take a serial number photo : Select "[OK]" button> Taking pictures (serial number) > Select "OK" button 
2. Direct input: Enter serial number in serial field> Select "OK" button
mp4, wmv ... Can not play video?
In PallyCon SD Player app, only DRM-packaged video provided by Inca Entworks can be played. \n(Inquiries: nd@pallycon.com / Inca Entwicks ND Team)
How do I use the video (lecture) player?

The video (lecture) player has the following functions. 

1. Play button - Select this when playing back images. 
2. Stop and pause button - Select to stop or pause video playback. 
3. Playback bar - Check the playback status and drag it to the position of the desired part on the playback bar. 
4. Adjust the volume - Select this to adjust the volume of the picture.

If the video (lecture) does not play smoothly, please exit the app and run it again. 

If you can not rerun your app, 

1. Delete app data 
- Settings> General> Apps or Applications> PallyCon SD Player app Touch> Touch storage> Clear data 
(Serial authentication is required. Enter the serial number of the most authenticated user.) 

2. Reinstall the app 
- Please uninstall and re-install the app. 
(Serial authentication is required. Enter the serial number of the most authenticated user.)
If you touch the video (lecture), the phrase "Invalid palyback period" pops up and it can not be played.
If the video (lecture) has a time limit, it can be played only during playback.
When attempting authentication in "Serial authentication", "OVER LIMIT DEVICE COUNT: Can not register this device !!" The phrase is up and I can not get certified.
The serial number you entered is the serial number already used.
I can not see the file in the repository.

Please re-run the app or try refreshing. (Sweeping the screen from top to bottom will refresh.) 

1. Internal Storage: Shows images stored in the internal storage of the smartphone. 
2. SD card: It shows the image stored in SD card external storage. 
3. USB storage: OTG (USB) Shows images stored in external storage.
